CreditsÂ¶

The software uses the following open source packages:

[jupyter-notebook](http://jupyter.org/) [numpy](http://numpy.org/) [matplotlib](http://matplotlib.org/) [scikit-image](http://scikit-image.org/) [scipy](https://scipy.org/scipylib/) [numba](https://numba.pydata.org) [skan](https://jni.github.io/skan/) [networkx](https://networkx.org/) [toolz](https://github.com/pytoolz/toolz/) [matplotlib-scalebar](https://pypi.org/project/matplotlib-scalebar/)
